statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); custom=$(echo "$input" | bash /Users/ysoftman/.claude/statusline-command.sh 2>/dev/null); omc=$(echo "$input" | node /Users/ysoftman/.claude/hud/omc-hud.mjs 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$custom" ] && [ -n "$omc" ]; then printf "%s\n%s" "$custom" "$omc"; elif [ -n "$custom" ]; then printf "%s" "$custom"; elif [ -n "$omc" ]; then printf "%s" "$omc"; fi'
